name: swipe
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: swipe
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to hit or try to hit something, especially with a sideways movement
trans_examp.trans_cn: 击打，尤指抡起（某物）猛打

example.eg: She opened the window and swiped at the flies with a rolled-up newspaper to make them go out.
example.egtrans: 她打开窗户，挥舞着卷起的报纸一阵猛打，想把苍蝇赶出去。

example.eg: She swiped him round the head.
The car swiped the side of the garage as he pulled out.
example.egtrans: 他把车开出去的时候撞上了车库的大门。

dsense.name: swipe
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.egtrans: 好吧，是谁偷了我的钥匙？

dsense.name: swipe
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to move a card containing information stored on a magnetic strip through a device that reads this information
to move your finger over the screen of a mobile phone or tablet in order to move onto the next page, choose something, etc.

example.eg: Swipe left to see more search results.
example.egtrans: 左滑查看更多搜索结果。

name: swipe
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: swipe
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a criticism of someone or something, or an attempt to annoy them or damage it

example.eg: In a recent interview, she takes a swipe at the theatre management.
example.egtrans: 在最近的一次采访中，她批评了剧院的管理。

dsense.name: swipe
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an act of hitting or trying to hit someone or something

example.eg: Ed took a swipe at the ball and missed.
example.egtrans: 埃迪挥臂击球，但没打中。
